dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q159 . # from russia
     ?band wdt:P527 ?item . 
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label         ?label.
      }



}
GROUP BY ?label
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 30

chart_legend.y: Number of people in the band

dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?Member ?MemberLabel (year(xsd:dateTime(?BirthDate)) as ?Birth) ?BirthPlace ?BirthPlaceLabel ?VoiceType ?VoiceTypeLabel 
WHERE { wd:Q949424 wdt:P527 ?Member . ?Member wdt:P569 ?BirthDate . 
       OPTIONAL {?Member wdt:P412 ?VoiceType.} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".} } 
LIMIT 10
